code:
---
config:
  theme: default
title: Sockets Client - Execution Flow
---

sequenceDiagram
    autonumber
    actor User
    participant Main as SocketsClient
    
    box rgb(IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode) Middleware Layer
        participant ClientAdapter as TCPClientAdapter
        participant Network
    end
    
    box rgb(IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController) App Layer - Application
        participant UseCase as SendFileUseCase
    end
    
    box rgb(IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream) App Layer - Infrastructure
        participant Repo as ConsoleFileRepository
    end
    
    participant Console
    
    box rgb(IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker) Server Side
        participant Server
    end

    User->>Main: Start client application
    Main->>Repo: new ConsoleFileRepository(IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)
    Main->>UseCase: new SendFileUseCase(IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)
    Main->>ClientAdapter: new TCPClientAdapter(IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)
    Main->>ClientAdapter: start(IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)

    ClientAdapter->>Console: Print "Connecting to localhost:1234"
    ClientAdapter->>Network: new Socket(IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)
    Network-->>ClientAdapter: Return connected socket
    ClientAdapter->>Console: Print "Connected to server"

    ClientAdapter->>UseCase: execute(IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)
    UseCase->>Repo: getFileFromSrc(IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)
    Repo->>Console: Print "Enter content for 'message': "
    Console->>User: Display prompt
    User->>Console: Type message and press Enter
    Console-->>Repo: Return input string
    Repo->>Repo: Create File entity
    Repo-->>UseCase: Return File
    UseCase->>UseCase: Extract content
    UseCase-->>ClientAdapter: Return content string

    ClientAdapter->>Network: write(IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)
    ClientAdapter->>Network: newLine(IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)
    ClientAdapter->>Network: flush(IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)
    Network->>Server: Send data packet
    ClientAdapter->>Console: Print "Sent: [IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]"

    ClientAdapter->>Network: Close socket
    ClientAdapter->>Console: Print "Connection closed"
    ClientAdapter-->>Main: Return
    Main-->>User: Exit application

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 然后，流程会走到 IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode 和 IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController。
明白，所以它是承接上一步的，内容是 'IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode 和 IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController'？
